txt.en: You have selected Ottó as your favourite to win
The race has begun! Betting is now closed
Ottó has won the race!
You have a vested interest in Ottó's success as he runs the Summer Festival Keg-hopping Race.
Ottó has lost the race
Ottó has lost the race
Ottó has lost the race
You have left the race area

'Well, [placeholder], good day to you! It is often said that there is nothing better than fine summer weather, though it is a little balmy for my taste this time of year. I am sweltering where I stand!

'These lazy summer days can drag on, which is why we look forward to the Festival events! This year, inhabitants of Thorin's Hall are racing to finish the Keg-hopping Race event as quickly as possible. Who do you think will win?

'If you want to know a little secret, Ottó is undoubtedly the strongest candidate. I do not think I've ever seen him without a mug in his hand! Just between you and me, he is as stout a dwarf as ever there was.'

Tickets for the race can be picked up at Jorfi at the Keg-hopping race. Tickets can be turned in to place a wager.\n\nYou will need to hand over a Festival Ticket in order to select Ottó as your favourite to win.
'I see you had some luck at the keg-races! Allow me to be the first to bid you congratulations on your excellent luck, [placeholder]. Here is your reward.'
The Keg-hopping Race begins soon on this very track.\n\nYou have guessed that Ottó will win the race, and you should observe whether or not this comes to pass.
Arnar can be found in the Keg-race area during the Summer Festival.\n\nYou should speak with Arnar and collect the bountiful prize he has to offer for your excellent luck.
'Ottó is certainly my favourite for this round. But why are you talking to me? Watch the race, [placeholder]!'
'You think Ottó's your dwarf? Well then, hand me one of your Festival Tickets, and I'll jot down your wager on him.\n\n'Good luck, [placeholder]!'
'Sorry, [placeholder]. I'm afraid you'll need a Festival Ticket in order to select a contestant.\n\n'Jorfi is handing out tickets in Thorin's Hall...I'd go see him right away!'
Turn in a Festival Ticket to select Ottó
Observe the race to see if Ottó is victorious
Talk to Arnar
Do not leave the race area
Keg-hopping Race: Ottó the Outstanding
